body_html:
Yeah, I’ve checked, loss_contrastive.data[0] is a float.
Thanks for the link, now I can calculate memory usage of my model. But the thing is, I’m running it on Tesla k40, so this 2Gb on fc layer is kinda ok. I’ll check it later today anyways.

body:
Yeah, I’ve checked, loss_contrastive.data[0] is a float. 
Thanks for the link, now I can calculate memory usage of my model. But the thing is, I’m running it on Tesla k40, so this 2Gb on fc layer is kinda ok. I’ll check it later today anyways.
